author: Jack Power
title: Covid-19: Inside the operation to evacuate Irish stranded abroad
description: From Peru and Australia: Behind the scenes story of how diplomats got the Irish home
content:
Ten hours into a gruelling bus journey from Tarapoto, a city on the edge of the Amazon in northern Peru, the bus carrying Irish citizens to Lima for a flight home was stopped by two local police officers.
The minibus was one of five organised by Irish diplom… [+10000 chars]
